reviewText: I like most of the actors and actresses in this film.  Enjoyed the film, but might be a good film for all "politicians" to have to watch to see what they shouldn't do or be like except for the end.

reviewText: this movie Running Mates doesn't have much story, creativity or originality. the jokes are old and flat and the players are one dimensional and are not very convensing. The story is a persons tale of rising in the ranks within a political party. there is a vague plot to do with the candidates sleeping with his political aide who is coarse and mean to her volunteer staff and is about how hard Tom Sellick (the candidate) works to hide it from the press and his wife. just a bland retelling of the age old war within three's a crowd.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I had first seen this film on TNT and I liked it immediately.  When I found out it would be released on DVD, I got it right away.  I was surprised but glad that the film is presented in a widescreen format.  The film had a great cast which gave good performances.  The film's humorous moments were also enjoyable.  This movie can be compared to the film "The American President" and the series "The West Wing".  This is one of the best films ever made.  I think that this film is really worth watching.
Title: N/A

reviewText: We like Tom Seleck. I was excited to find a movie we did not own/had seen. On viewing, it was somewhat of a disappointment.  If I had to rate it it would be a "D" script -- but Tom was as good as one could hope for with the limitations placed upon him.  I have no complaints about the seller.  They rate 4 stars.
summary: Amazon strikes again and this time sort of pleases my husband
Title: N/A

reviewText: I would give five stars to the great actors in this film, mainly for them seeing it out to the end. I wish I looked at the reviews before buying it. I must admit I only bought it because it starred Tom Selleck. In fact, I only watched it to the end because I expected that since Tom Selleck and a number of other fine actors had agreed to be in the film that the plot must be about to turn a corner at any minute, what I mean is that it might find a plot line just around the corner. But then it ended, and I am left wondering, what was that about???? For me it only deserved zero stars, but I must give it at least one star, if only for the great actors in it.
summary: One star for the great actors
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought this movie thinking I was going to be in for a good laugh, but instead found a movie about people in politics that were sad and annoying.  I couldn't get into it and had a hard time finding any humor in it at all. I got half way through it and had to turn it off.  Maybe I was expecting a satire on politics, instead what was revealed was the truth in politics and that isn't funny.  If the movie had fallen under a drama, I may have been able to get through it, but then again I probably wouldn't have bought it at all. I only give it two stars because Selleck gives his usual performance as a caring guy, but this time in the wrong storyline.

reviewText: Other people may like this movie. I just don't expect to see Tom in this role. I've met him personally several times. He is rugged & in person like his JessieStone & Sackkett roles. He's big, big rough hands & that's what I like to see him as.Acting was good but just not him

reviewText: This movie is a good watch. Selleck is perfect for the part and the rest of the cast is excellent. There is a scene later on it the film that is worth the price of admission in itself! Laura Linney,Faye Dunaway,Nancy Travis and Teri Hatcher together in a room talking about the man is one of those moments you watch movies for.Besides the cast and the humor and the politics this is afeel good movie.Watch it.
